metadata.title: CVE-2024-36948 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/xe/xe_migrate: Cast to output precision before multiplying operandsAddressing potential overflow in result of multiplication of two lowerprecision (u32) operands before widening it to higher precision (u64). -v2Fix commit message and description. (Rodrigo) (cherry picked from commit34820967ae7b45411f8f4f737c2d63b0c608e0d7)
